ModMetaData.name: Run Gun and Destroy (unlisted beta)
ModMetaData.author: Roolo, Owlchemist
ModMetaData.description: This is a continuation, overhaul and merging of the mods "Run and Gun" and "Seach and Destroy", by Roolo. It allows pawns - both your own and AI controlled - to shoot while moving, as well as enabling colonists to actively move towards and engage hostiles.
